¶ \w And|strong="G1161"\w* he put \w forth|strong="G3004"\w* a \w parable|strong="G3850"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* those \w which|strong="G3588"\w* were \w bidden|strong="G2564"\w*, when he \w marked|strong="G1907"\w* \w how|strong="G4459"\w* they chose \w out|strong="G1586"\w* the chief \w rooms|strong="G4411"\w*; \w saying|strong="G3004"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*,
